Which of the following statements is not correct?
data.answer: All partnerships, no matter how created or organized are considered corporations  subject to corporate income tax.
choices: As a rule, a co ownership is mot subject to income tax because the activities of the co-owners are limited to the preservation and enjoyment of the property and the collection of the income there from.
A co-owner is subject to income tax on his share in the net income of the co-ownership actually or constructively received.

When the co-owners invest the income of the property co-owned in a business or any income producing properties or activities constituting themselves into a business partnership, such partnership is consequently subject to tax as a corporation.
